game-level-start.name: Wake Up
messages: You wake up in a building
You dont know where you are

game-level-forest-1.name: Forest Entrance
messages: You entered a forest
You can hear the sound of birds

game-level-forest-2.name: Somewhere in the forest
messages: You hear something behind you
You look around
You seem to have forgot the way back

game-level-forest-3.name: Somewhere in the forest
messages: You look around
It looks the same, but you know its not

game-level-lake-1.name: Front of lake
messages: You found a lake
Its not really big, you think you can swim over
Maybe go around?

game-level-lake-2.name: Other side of lake
messages: You made it to the other side
You can see something shining in the water

game-level-cave-1.name: Small cave
messages: You found a cave and went into it
You didnt freeze to death

game-level-forest-opening-1.name: Forest opening
messages: You went out of the cave
Its morning now
You spot something shiny on your right

game-level-forest-opening-bush-1.name: A bush in forest opening
messages: You found something shiny

game-level-big-cave-1.name: Big cave
messages: You went into the big cave
You can see something looking like a chest
You hope you brought the shiny key

game-level-big-cave-2.name: Deeper in big cave
messages: You went deeper into the big cave
You see an exit you can climb out of

game-level-mountain-floor-1.name: Mountain floor
messages: You are on the floor of a mountain
You see something shining on the mountain

game-level-mountain-floor-2.name: Mountain floor, higher up
messages: You climbed andfound another mountain floor
You can see something looking like a chest
You think there might be more on the top

game-level-forest-4.name: Forest Entrance
messages: You found another forest

game-level-forest-5.name: Forest path
messages: The path turn right, but you think about going forward

game-level-forest-5-2.name: Away from forest path
messages: You see something in a tree

game-level-forest-6.name: Forest path
messages: You keep going down the forest path
You spot a wrench on the ground
If you dont have one, you will need this

game-level-forest-7.name: Forest path
messages: You keep going down the forest path
You find a bronze dagger, you dont think you will need this

game-level-forest-opening-2.name: Forest opening
messages: The path ends here
You are in a forest opening now
You spot a lake on your side, maybe swim over?

game-level-plains-1.name: Plains
messages: You enter a plains biome
You see a lake in the distance

game-level-plains-2.name: Plains near lake
messages: You can see something in the lake
Maybe dive?

game-level-lake-underwater-1.name: Diving in lake
messages: You are diving in the lake
You should surface so you dont die

game-level-lake-3.name: Other side of lake
messages: You surface on the other side of the lake
You spot a mountain in the distance

game-level-mountain-floor-3.name: Mountain floor
messages: You are on the floor of a mountain
There is a path going up

game-level-mountain-path-1.name: Mountain path
messages: You are on a mountain path
The path ends here, but you see something hanging on a mountain side tree

game-level-mountain-side-tree-1.name: Mountain side tree
messages: You made it to the tree in one piece
You see a chest, you recognice whats inside it

game-level-valley-1.name: Valley
messages: You are in a valley
You can spot a river
You can see a bridge in the distance

game-level-valley-2.name: Other side of river in valley
messages: You went over the bridge to the other side
You look around and see a cave in the distance

game-level-valley-3.name: Valley near cave
messages: You went to the cave and think about down into it

game-level-valley-cave-1.name: Valley cave
messages: You went into the cave
You see something in the distance

game-level-valley-4.name: Valley near cave
messages: You are at an forest entrance, you can see a path going forward

game-level-forest-8.name: Forest
messages: You are in a forest
You follow the path going forward

game-level-forest-9.name: Forest
messages: You keep following the forest path

game-level-forest-10.name: Forest
messages: You keep following the forest path, it goes right now
You stub into something on the path

game-level-forest-11.name: Forest
messages: You keep following the forest path

game-level-forest-12.name: Forest
messages: You keep following the forest path
You think you spot another crashed spaceship in the distance

game-level-forest-13.name: Forest
messages: You keep following the forest path
You are at the spaceship entrance

game-level-forest-spaceship-1.name: Spaceship in forest
messages: You are inside the crashed spaceship
Nobody seems to be alive here

game-level-forest-spaceship-2.name: Spaceship in forest
messages: You keep carefully exploring the spaceship
there is a crossing, should you go left or right?

game-level-forest-spaceship-3.name: Room to the left in spaceship
messages: You went left
The room appears to be empty, only a bed and table

game-level-forest-spaceship-4.name: Room to the right in spaceship
messages: You went right
The room appears to be the engine room
You search for parts you can use in your spaceship
